title: Why is PBE NA only?
body:
I have been thinking of this lately, since I've been wanting a PBE account for quite some time, and had one before I took a break from League.

The EUW site doesn't even have an application site, which NA has. 

I was merely wondering why this is the case. I know that the servers are in NA, so people form EU will have high ping, but I don't really think that would be something "bad".

replies.body:
Actually, you can sign up for PBE access using your EUW account from our [**EUW PBE Signup Page**](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

Let me know if you have any questions! (▰˘v˘▰)

When I go to that page, all I get is that "something went wrong". 

However, I think I have applied before, but I can't recall if it ever came forward. 
Anyhow, thank you.
Ah, it worked now. Thanks again.
